inclusion.criterion: No concomitant diseases that influence metabolic control
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subjects do not participate in any other interventional study
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known or suspected allergy to trial products.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Any significant diseases or conditions including psychiatric disorders and substance abuse that, in the opinion of the investigator, is likely to affect the subject's ability to complete the study, or compromise patient safety
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Diabetic ketoacidosis in the past 3 months.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe hypoglycemia resulting in seizure or loss of consciousness in the month prior to enrollment.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current use of oral glucocorticoids or other medications, which in the judgment of the investigator would be a contraindication to participation in the study.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subject is participating in another drug or device study that could affect glucose measurements or glucose management.

notes: Patient has type 1 diabetes and meets age criteria. No concomitant diseases mentioned, but no CGM use. No other interventional studies mentioned.
